actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that the Department of Defense may not construct new housing facilities in the United States if there are suitable housing facilities in the surrounding community available for acquisition.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Defense to consult with the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development as to the availability of private housing in a U.S. location before constructing any family housing at such location. Directs the Secretary of Defense to give Congress 30 days notice of a lack of housing before contracting for construction. Limits the cost and size of such housing.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that the Department of Defense may not construct new housing facilities in the United States if there are suitable housing facilities in the surrounding community available for acquisition.
